titleStmt.title: The raising of them that are fallen A discourse very profitable and beneficial to all faithfull Christians dialoguewise, betwixt a knight and a gentleman· Set foorth for the benefit and good of all such people as are afflicted eyther in minde or conscience. Written by Thomas Sauile Gent? [sic]
titleStmt.author: Savile, Thomas, fl. 1595-1613.
